timeline.bodyText:
Just a thought:
sections.getOrDefault(player.getName(), List.of()).contains(key.get(1))
would be a shorter variant of the if statement, I haven't convinced myself that it's clearly better though
timeline.author: RoiEXLab

replies.bodyText: A more radical change introduces unwanted risk and perhaps should arguably be tested. I'm not saying I disagree, only that such a change should be done as it's own PR where we make that one change or a set of similar changes and ensure it is adequately tested.
replies.author: DanVanAtta

replies.bodyText: A multimap might be what we want. Having a person reading code realize that the later execution is a no-op because we default to an empty list is a bit indirect. It is arguably simpler than the series of if statements, I agree that is debatable.
replies.author: DanVanAtta

timeline.bodyText: This put operation is redundant btw if I'm not missing something obvious
timeline.author: RoiEXLab
